com.gtp.hunter.rfid.asciiprotocol.responders

Class SynchronousDispatchResponder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gtp.hunter.rfid.asciiprotocol.responders.SynchronousDispatchResponder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IAsciiCommandResponder 

    public class SynchronousDispatchResponder
extends java.lang.Object
implements IAsciiCommandResponder
    This is a special TSLAsciiCommandResponder that is inserted into the responder chain to handle synchronous commands. This responder uses its synchronousCommandDelegate to find the currently executing synchronous command. If such a command exists then this responder forwards calls to processReceivedLine:moreLinesAvailable: to the synchronous command's synchronousCommandResponder

      • processReceivedLine

        public final boolean processReceivedLine(java.lang.String fullLine,
                          boolean moreLinesAvailable)
                                  throws java.lang.Exception
        Each correctly terminated line from the device is passed to this method for processing
        Specified by:
        processReceivedLine in interface IAsciiCommandResponder
        Parameters:
        fullLine - The line to be processed
        moreLinesAvailable - When YES indicates there are additional lines to be processed (and will also be passed to this method)
        Returns:
        YES if this line should not be passed to any other responder
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
